pageProduct.name: Palmers Shea Formula Lotion 400ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Shea Butter Formula  Body Lotion is crafted with vitamin-enriched Shea Butter to richly replenish dry, sensitive skin.  Now with 48 hour moisture.

Warnings

For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes.

Common Uses

Shea Butter is sustainably produced, and contains important vitamins and micro-nutrients, making it a superior skin-friendly moisturiser, particularly for soothing sensitive skin.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Isopropyl Myristate, Propylene Glycol, Cetyl Alcohol, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Avena Sativa (Oat) Meal Extract, Fragrance (Parfum), PEG-40 Stearate, Stearyl Alcohol, Carbomer, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Hydroxide, Tetrasodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Metabisulfite, Sodium Sulfite, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Benzyl Alcohol.

Directions

Use daily on clean, dry skin.
